relationships.description: Fleur used the Bubble-Head Charm to retrieve her hostage
Cedric Diggory used the Bubble-Head Charm to retrieve his hostage

Fleur was awarded zero points for failing to retrieve her hostage
Cedric Diggory was awarded 47 points for successfully retrieving his hostage
